item.title: CodeIgniter + nginx : Facebook application
Kwippy facebook application
item.description: Hello all kwippers and people who want to archive their status application, we just released an application which lets you do just that and more if you are integrate the application with kwippy. here is the link http://www.new.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=6806564434 We need more people ;) , feel free to invite your friends too ….
